sentence.Network_en: a languid wave of the hand
His languid manner annoys me when there's work to be done.
sentence.Network_cn: 有工作要做的时候,他那懒散的态度总叫我着恼.

sentence.Network_en: Time spent at Jumby Bay can be as energetic or as languid as you wish.
sentence.Network_cn: 来鬼湾消磨时光，动静皆宜，尽可随心所欲。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 淡淡的英文单词怎么写？-外语-天涯问答 ... insane a. 精神错乱的 languid a. 倦怠的，无精打采的 lean vi. 倾斜，屈身.
淡淡的英文单词怎么写？-外语-天涯问答 ... insane a. 精神错乱的 languid a. 倦怠的，无精打采的 lean vi. 倾斜，屈身.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... lane 小径，行车道，巷 languid 没精打采的，倦怠的 lash 鞭打，责骂；眼睫毛.
SAT-填空题OG - 豆丁网 ... motley 混杂的，异质的 languid 疲倦的没精打采的（谐音：懒鬼） mysterious 神秘的.

list.abs: I had forgotten braid my hair . The languid breeze played with it upon my neck ., 我忘记把头发编起 . 困倦的风在我颊上和它嬉戏.
palm fronds dipping into languid lagoons ; the ripple of a zephyr across white sand beaches ., 棕榈枝浸泡到无精打采湖 , 横跨白沙滩和风纹波.
in a weak or pale or languid manner ., 以虚弱 , 苍白或者疲倦的方式.
in a weak or pale or languid manner ., 以虚弱 , 苍白或者疲倦的方式.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): from French languide or Latin languidus, from languere (see languish)

entry.tran: 无精打采的；懒洋洋的；倦怠的
entry.def: If you describe someone as languid, you mean that they show little energy or interest and are very slow and casual in their movements.

example.ex: To his delight a familiar, tall, languid figure lowered itself down the steps of a club.
example.tran: 看到一个熟悉的高大身影沿着俱乐部的台阶无精打采地走下来，他高兴极了。

example.ex: Time spent at Jumby Bay can be as energetic or as languid as you wish.
example.tran: 来琼比湾消磨时光，动静皆宜，尽可随心所欲。

auth_sentence.content: Henry prefers the languid Down with This Sort of Thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Henry prefers the languid Down with This Sort of Thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Henry prefers the languid Down with This Sort of Thing.

auth_sentence.content: In their hearts they must be humiliated by his languid hauteur.
auth_sentence.res_content: In their hearts they must be humiliated by his languid hauteur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In their hearts they must be humiliated by his languid hauteur.

auth_sentence.content: We wander, awestruck, amid these languid mountains of blubber.
auth_sentence.res_content: We wander, awestruck, amid these languid mountains of blubber.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We wander, awestruck, amid these languid mountains of blubber.

stems_affixes.word_buile: langu虚弱+id表形容词,如:morbid病态的→adj.没精打采的,怠倦的
langu虚弱+ish表动词→v.衰弱,变得消瘦

sentences.en: His languid manner annoys me when there’s work to be done.
sentences.cn: 有工作要做的时候,他那懒散的态度总叫我着恼。
